'''Coralmason''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|When you first enter the workshop, you find the Vailian scientist, Iverra, and a large aumaua man in heated conversation. He gestures wildly, his mouth is set in a hard grimace that bares his pointed teeth. Iverra regards him with her hands planted firmly on her hips.

When he spots, you his eyes widen.}}

Coralmason is, well, a coral mason on Sayuka. He's part of a team of scientists trying to find a way to stop the out-of-control coral growths around Sayuka. He's surmised that a magical disturbance is the source of the problem, located somewhere in the deep sea southeast of the island, once the location of an old Engwithan ruin [Cignath Mór](/cignathMor/).

[Category:Sayuka characters](/categorySayukaCharacters/)

## =Quests

=
* [Overgrowth](/overgrowth/): He and [Iverra](/iverra/) think they've found the source of the coral growths on Sayuka, and naturally task you to investigate. He is found in the [workshop](/workshopSayuka/), but will leave when you finish dialogue with him.

'''Coralmason''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|When you first enter the workshop, you find the Vailian scientist, Iverra, and a large aumaua man in heated conversation. He gestures wildly, his mouth is set in a hard grimace that bares his pointed teeth. Iverra regards him with her hands planted firmly on her hips.

When he spots, you his eyes widen.}}

Coralmason is, well, a coral mason on Sayuka. He's part of a team of scientists trying to find a way to stop the out-of-control coral growths around Sayuka. He's surmised that a magical disturbance is the source of the problem, located somewhere in the deep sea southeast of the island, once the location of an old Engwithan ruin [[Cignath Mór]].
